titleStmt.title: An answer to a book, spread abroad by the Romish priests, intituled, The touchstone of the reformed Gospel wherein the true doctrine of the Church of England, and many texts of the Holy Scripture are faithfully explained / by the Right Reverend Father in God, Symon, Lord Bishop of Ely.
titleStmt.author: Patrick, Simon, 1626-1707.

notesStmt.note: "The touchstone of the reformed Gospel" is by Matthew Kellison.
